data.name: AboutView_DownloadNewVersion
data.comment: Clickable link allowing the user to download the latest version of SyncTrayzor

data.name: AboutView_NewAppVersionAvailable
data.comment: Prompt showing the user that a new version of SynTrayzor is available {0}: Latest version of SyncTrayzor

data.name: AboutView_SyncthingVersion
data.comment: Information showing the user the current version of Syncthing {0}: Current Syncthing version

data.name: AboutView_Version
data.comment: Information showing the user the current version of SyncTrayzor {0}: Current SyncTrayzor version

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Cancel
data.comment: 'Cancel' button shown in various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Close
data.comment: 'Close' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Save
data.comment: 'Save' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_DontRemind
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows the user to say they want want to be prompted to upgrade to this particular version again

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_Download
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows them to download the new version

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Button_RemindLater
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This button allows them to say they want to be prompted the next time they start SyncTrayzor

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_DontRemindMeExplanation
data.value: «Καμμια υπενθυμιση ξανα« θα σιγήσει υπενθυμίσεις για αυτή την έκδοση. Μπορείτε να απενεργοποιήσετε μόνιμα νέα έκδοση ειδοποιήσεων από τη σελίδα Ρυθμίσεις. Επισκεφθείτε Βοήθεια -> Σχετικά με για χειροκίνητο έλεγχο για νέα έκδοση.
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This message tells the user how to permanently disable new version prompts. 'The Settings page' corresponds to ShellView_Menu_File. 'Help ->About' corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Help_About.

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_NewVersionAvailable
data.value: Μια νέα έκδοση {0} του SyncTrayzor είναι διαθέσιμη
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This text appears at the top of that prompt

data.name: NewVersionAlertView_Title
data.value: Μια νέα έκδοση του SyncTrayzor είναι διαθέσιμη
data.comment: When a new version is available, the user receives a prompt. This is the title of that prompt.

data.name: SettingsView_AlertOnNewVersion
data.value: Ειδοποίηση αν μια νέα έκδοση του SyncTrayzor είναι διαθέσιμη

data.name: SettingsView_ApiKey_ToolTip
data.value: Το SyncTrayzor παρακάμπτει το κλειδί API που καθορίζεται στην διαμόρφωση του Syncthing. Ωστόσο, μπορείτε να το ρυθμίσετε σε οτι τιμή σας αρέσει εδώ.
data.comment: ToolTip shown when a user hovers over the SettingsView_ApiKey text input. This shows more information on the input.

data.name: SettingsView_CloseToTray
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to indicate that the 'close' button on the top right of the window should put Syncthing down into the tray, rather than closing the application

data.name: SettingsView_MinimizeToTray
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to indicate that the 'minimize' button on the top right of the window should put Syncthing down into the tray, rather than minimizing the application

data.name: SettingsView_MustRestartSyncthingWarning
data.value: Πρέπει να κάνετε επανεκκίνηση του Syncthing για να τεθούν σε ισχύ οι αλλαγές σε αυτές τις ρυθμίσεις

data.name: SettingsView_ObfuscateDeviceIds
data.value: Συσκοτίστε τα αναγνωριστικά της συσκευής στην προβολή ημερολογίου

data.name: SettingsView_OnlyShowTrayIconOnClose
data.value: Εμφάνιση εικονιδίου γραμμής εργασιών μόνο κατα το κλεισιμο

data.name: SettingsView_Section_Advanced
data.comment: Section header for advanced settings

data.name: SettingsView_Section_StartOnLogin
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with automatically starting SyncTrayzor when the user logs in

data.name: SettingsView_Section_Syncthing
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with configuring Syncthing

data.name: SettingsView_Section_SyncTrayzor
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with configuring SyncTrayzor

data.name: SettingsView_Section_WatchedFolders
data.comment: Section header for settings to do with configuring SyncTrayzor's ability to watch folders for changes

data.name: SettingsView_ShowBalloonWhenSynchronized
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that a balloon message (white area down by the tray icon, linked to the tray icon) should be shown whenever a folder finishes synchronizing

data.name: SettingsView_StartMinimized
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that, when SyncTrayzor is started automatically on login, it should start in the tray, rather than being visible to the user

data.name: SettingsView_StartOnLogin
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that SyncTrayzor should be started when the user logs in

data.name: SettingsView_StartOnLogin_PermissionDenied
data.value: Δεν έχετε άδεια πρόσβασης. Παρακαλούμε ξεκινήστε το SyncTrayzor ως διαχειριστής για να αλλάξετε αυτές τις ρυθμίσεις.
data.comment: Message displayed instead of SettingsView_StartOnLogin SettingsView_StartMinimized when the user doesn't have permission to edit the registry

data.name: SettingsView_StartSyncthingAutomatically
data.value: Έναρξη του Syncthing όταν ξεκινά το SyncTrayzor
data.comment: Setting allowing the user to specify that Syncthing should be start automatically when SyncTrayzor starts

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingAddress_ToolTip
data.value: Το SyncTrayzor παρακάμπτει την GUI διεύθυνση που καθορίζεται στην διαμόρφωση του Syncthing. Ωστόσο, μπορείτε να το ρυθμίσετε σε οτι τιμή σας αρέσει εδώ.
data.comment: ToolTip shown when a user hovers over the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress text input. This shows more information on the input.

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingUseCustomHome
data.value: Χρήση προσαρμοσμένου καταλόγου για το Syncthing

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingUseCustomHome_ToolTip
data.value: Αυτό θα σημαίνει ότι το Syncrayzor θα εμφανισει ένα διαφορετικό σύνολο διαμορφωμένων φακέλων σε άλλες περιπτώσεις του Syncthing στον υπολογιστή σας.
data.comment: ToolTip shown when a user hovers over the SettingsView_SyncthingUseCustomHome text input. This shows more information on the input.

data.name: SettingsView_Title
data.comment: Title of the 'settings' dialog

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolders_Explanation
data.value: The following folders will be watched for changes, which means you can set a longer polling interval.

data.name: SettingsView_WatchedFolders_Unavailable
data.value: Φάκελοι μη διαθέσιμη. Παρακαλούμε ξεκινήστε το Syncthing

data.name: AboutView_UnknownVersion
data.comment: Shown within AboutView_SyncthingVersion if Syncthing's version couldn't be determined

data.name: Dialog_ConfirmKillAllProcesses_Message
data.value: Είστε σίγουροι ότι θέλετε να τερματισετε όλες τις διεργασίες του Syncthing, ακόμα και αυτες που δεν διαχειρίζεται το SyncTrayzor;
data.comment: Body for the dialog show when the user clicks on ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll

data.name: Dialog_ConfirmKillAllProcesses_Title
data.comment: Title for the dialog shown when the user clicks on ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll

data.name: Dialog_FailedToStartSyncthing_Message
data.value:
Αποτυχία να ξεκινήσει το Syncthing.
Παρακαλούμε διαβάστε το αρχείο καταγραφής για να προσδιορίσετε την αιτία.
Αν εμφανίζεται η ειδηση "Μοιραίο: Αδυναμια ανοιγματος βάσης δεδομένων", παρακαλούμε κλείστε όλα τα άλλα ανοικτα παραθυρα του Syncthing. Αν το SyncTrayzor συνετρίβη στο παρελθόν, μπορεί να υπάρχουν ακόμη διαδικασίες Syncthing ενεργες. Παρακαλούμε χρησιμοποιήστε την επιλογή μενού "Syncthing -> Τερματισμος ολων των Syncthing διαδικασιων» για να τα σταματήσετε, και στη συνέχεια χρησιμοποιήστε "Syncthing -> ναρξη" για να ξεκινήσετε το Syncthing πάλι.
data.comment:
Content of the dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't be started (and exited with an error). Instructs the user on how to proceed.
"FATAL: Cannot Open Database" should remain in English
The menu option "Syncthing ->Kill all Syncthing processes" corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_KillAll, while "Syncthing ->Start" corresponds to ShellView_Menu_Syncthing_Start

data.name: Dialog_FailedToStartSyncthing_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't be started (and exited with an error)

data.name: Dialog_SyncthingBlockedByGroupPolicy_Message
data.comment: Content of dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't start because of group policy settings (probably) {0}: Exact exception message {1}: Path to Syncthing executable

data.name: Dialog_SyncthingBlockedByGroupPolicy_Title
data.comment: Title of dialog shown when Syncthing couldn't start because of group policy settings (probably)

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_InvalidUrl
data.value: Πρέπει να είναι έγκυρη η διεύθυνση URL
data.comment: Validation message (shown in red) below the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress field when the user enters a value which is not a value URL

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_NotShouldBeEmpty
data.comment: Validation message (shown in red) below the SettingsView_SyncthingAddress or SettingsView_ApiKey fields when the user makes this field empty

data.name: ThirdPartyComponentsView_Intro
data.value: Το SyncTrayzor έχει δομηθεί χρησιμοποιώντας πολλές συνιστώσες ανοιχτού κώδικα, και δεν θα υπήρχε χωρίς αυτες. Λεπτομέρειες για κάθε συστατικό, καθώς και το κείμενο της άδειας χρήσης, παρουσιάζονται παρακάτω.

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_FinishedSyncing_Message
data.comment:
Content of the balloon message shown when a folder finished synchronization
{0}:The name of the folder which finished synchronizing

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_CloseToTray
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to minimize itself to the tray

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Exit
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to exit

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Restore
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to restore itself from the tray, and be visible to the user

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_Settings
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to show the Settings dialog

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_StartSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to start Syncthing. Only available if Syncthing isn't running

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_StopSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to stop Syncthing. Only available if Syncthing is running

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_IntroMessage
data.value: Ωχ! Κάτι πήγε πολύ στραβά. Το SyncTrayzor θα πρέπει να κλείσει. Συγνώμη για αυτό

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_LogFileLocation_Post
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is informed that they may have to provide a log file, and gives the path. This text appears immediately after the log path

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_LogFileLocation_Pre
data.value: Μπορεί να σας ζητηθεί να δώσετε ένα αρχείο καταγραφής. Μπορείτε να το βρείτε σε:
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is informed that they may have to provide a log file, and gives the path. This text appears immediately before the log path

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_PleaseOpenIssue_Post
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is prompted to visit the Github issues page. This text appears immediately after the link to github, and also prompts the user to include the stack trace shown directly below this text

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_PleaseOpenIssue_Pre
data.comment: When an unhandled exception occurs, the user is prompted to visit the Github issues page. This text appears immediately before the link to github

data.name: UnhandledExceptionView_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog shown when an unhandled exception occurs

data.name: ViewerView_SyncthingStarting
data.comment: Text shown in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is starting, but there's no UI to display yet

data.name: ViewerView_SyncthingStopped
data.comment: Text shown in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is stopped

data.name: Generic_Dialog_No
data.comment: 'No' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_OK
data.comment: 'OK' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: Generic_Dialog_Yes
data.comment: 'Yes' button shown on various dialogs

data.name: TranslatorAttributation
data.comment: Shown on the 'about' page, this is space for you to attribute yourself. E.g. your local language equivalent of "Kingon translation by My Name". Add yourself to this field if you contribute to the translation for this language.

data.name: SettingsView_ShowDeviceConnectivityBalloons
data.value: Εμφάνιση της συσκευής σύνδεσης/αποσύνδεσης μηνυμάτων μπαλονιού

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceConnected_Message
data.comment: Message of tray icon balloon show when another device connects {0}: device name

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceConnected_Title
data.comment: Title of tray icon balloon when another device connected

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceDisconnected_Message
data.comment: Message of tray icon balloon show when another device disconnects {0}: device name

data.name: TrayIcon_Balloon_DeviceDisconnected_Title
data.comment: Title of tray icon balloon when another device disconnected

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_RestartSyncthing
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Instructs SyncTrayzor to restart

data.name: SettingsView_Tab_Syncthing
data.comment: 'Syncthing' settings tab

data.name: SettingsView_Tab_SyncTrayzor
data.comment: 'SyncTrayzor' settings tab

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingDenyUpgrade
data.value: Διακοπή της αυτόματης αναβάθμισης του Syncthing

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingDenyUpgrade_ToolTip
data.value: Διακοπή του Syncthing από την αυτόματη αναβάθμιση. Αυτό είναι χρήσιμο εάν μια νέα έκδοση του Syncthing διασπά την συμβατότητα με το SyncTrayzor. Θα χρειαστεί να υποβαθμίσετε το αρχείο syncthing.exe στο φάκελο config του SyncTrayzor

data.name: SettingsView_SyncthingRunLowPriority
data.value: Εκτέλεση του Syncthing ως χαμηλής προτεραιότητας διαδικασία

data.name: TrayIcon_Menu_OpenFolder
data.comment: Menu option available when right-clicking the tray icon. Is a header for a list of folders, each of which can be clicked to open it in Explorer

data.name: ViewerView_OpenFolder
data.comment: Button shown in the web interface, alongside the native 'rescan' and 'edit' buttons. Allows the folder to be opened in Explorer

data.name: ViewerView_StartSyncthing
data.comment: Link show in the centre of the screen when Syncthing is stopped, allowing the user to start syncthing

data.name: SettingsView_UseComputerCulture
data.value: Χρησιμοποιήση της γλώσσας του υπολογιστή, εφόσον είναι διαθέσιμη. Θα χρειαστεί να κάνετε επανεκκίνηση του SyncTrayzor για αυτό να τεθεί σε ισχύ

data.name: SettingsView_Validation_SyncthingEnvironmentalVariablesMustHaveFormat
data.value: Πρέπει να είναι στη μορφή 'VAR=value VAR2="val1 val2"'
